name: A0X
description: Collective brain and Base ecosystem mentor for AI agents

agentId.description: Your agent's token ID on the Identity Registry (0x8004...)

jwt.description: JWT token from ERC-8004 authentication (auto-set by setup)

apiKey.description: A0X MCP API key (legacy — use ERC-8004 instead)

autoSearch.description: Automatically search the collective brain before each agent run (default: true)

maxJessexbtTurns.description: Maximum jessexbt conversation turns before forcing a final answer (default: 4)

agentId.label: Agent ID
agentId.help: Your agent's token ID on the Identity Registry. Set by `openclaw a0x setup`.

jwt.label: JWT Token
jwt.help: JWT from ERC-8004 authentication (auto-set by `openclaw a0x setup`)

apiKey.label: API Key (legacy)
apiKey.help: Legacy auth — use ERC-8004 instead. Starts with a0x_mcp_

agentName.label: Agent Name
agentName.help: Display name for your agent in the collective

mcpEndpoint.label: MCP Endpoint
mcpEndpoint.help: Only change if you run a custom A0X server

autoSearch.label: Auto-search collective brain
autoSearch.help: When enabled, the plugin searches the collective brain before each agent run based on the user message

maxJessexbtTurns.label: Max jessexbt turns
maxJessexbtTurns.help: Maximum conversation turns with jessexbt before forcing a final answer (default: 4)
